alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Clay (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued August 12 at 4:21PM EDT until August 12 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 635 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST NORTH CAROLINA CHEROKEE CLAY IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 14 COUNTIES IN EAST TENNESSEE CARTER CLAIBORNE COCKE GRAINGER GREENE HAMBLEN HANCOCK HAWKINS JEFFERSON JOHNSON SEVIER SULLIVAN UNICOI WASHINGTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALPHA, ANDREWS, ARTHUR, BEAN STATION, BRASSTOWN, BRISTOL TN, BYBEE, CHESTNUT HILL, CLAIRFIELD, DANDRIDGE, DOEVILLE, ELIZABETHTON, ELKMONT, ERWIN, EVANSTON, GREENEVILLE, HAMPTON, HARRISBURG, HARROGATE-SHAWANEE, HARTFORD, HAYESVILLE, HIAWASSE DAM, HOWARD QUARTER, JEFFERSON CITY, JOHNSON CITY, KINGSPORT, KODAK, KYLES FORD, LAUREL BLOOMERY, LIMESTONE COVE, LONE MOUNTAIN, MARBLE, MCMAHAN, MOORESBURG, MORRISTOWN, MOUNTAIN CITY, MURPHY, NEVA, NEWPORT, PIGEON FORGE, RUSSELLVILLE, SANDLICK, SEVIERVILLE, SEYMOUR, SHADY VALLEY, SHOOTING CREEK, SNEEDVILLE, SOUTH HOLSTON DAM, SPRINGDALE, STRAWBERRY PLAINS, TOPTON, TRADE, TREADWAY, TUSQUITEE, UNAKA, UNICOI, VIOLET, AND WHITE PINE.
